talents.info_text:
Activate the infusion to increase movement speed by 0% for 1 game turn.

Any actions other than movement will cancel the effect.

talents.info_text:

talents.info_text:
Activate the infusion to increase three of your primary stats by 0 for 0 turns.

While Heroism is active, you will only die when reaching -0 life. However, when below 0 you cannot see how much life you have left.

It will always increase your three highest stats.

If your life is below 0 when this effect wears off it will be set to 1.

talents.info_text:

talents.info_text:
